dateCreated.description: Date and time the account of the fine/fee was created

dateUpdated.description: Date and time the account of the fine/fee was updated

name.description: Name of the status (values used are Open and Closed)

feeFineType.description: Fee/fine that is up to the desecration of the user

feeFineOwner.description: Owner of the fee/fine defined by the library and is associated with specific fees/fines

title.description: The title associated with the item

callNumber.description: Identifier (Call number) assigned to an item

barcode.description: Text, with input likely validated by the barcode scanner

materialType.description: Material type what define what type of thing the item is

location.description: Effective location is used to know the current home location for the item

metadata.title: Metadata Schema
metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to records, provided by the server (client should not provide)

createdDate.description: Date and time when the record was created

createdByUserId.description: ID of the user who created the record (when available)

createdByUsername.description: Username of the user who created the record (when available)

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the record (when available)

updatedByUsername.description: Username of the user who last updated the record (when available)

dueDate.description: Date time when the item is due to be returned

returnedDate.description: Date time when the item is returned and the loan ends, if the user does not have a loan associated, hyphen (-) is added as default

loanId.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID), this is a 128-bit number used to identify a record and is shown in hex with dashes, for example 6312d172-f0cf-40f6-b27d-9fa8feaf332f; the UUID version must be from 1-5; see https://dev.folio.org/guides/uuids/

userId.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID), this is a 128-bit number used to identify a record and is shown in hex with dashes, for example 6312d172-f0cf-40f6-b27d-9fa8feaf332f; the UUID version must be from 1-5; see https://dev.folio.org/guides/uuids/

itemId.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID), this is a 128-bit number used to identify a record and is shown in hex with dashes, for example 6312d172-f0cf-40f6-b27d-9fa8feaf332f; the UUID version must be from 1-5; see https://dev.folio.org/guides/uuids/

name.description: Personal name, corporate name, meeting name

feefineaction.title: Fee/fine actions schema
feefineaction.description: Transactions or activities associated with a user fee/fine account

dateAction.description: Date and time the transaction of the fine/fee was created

typeAction.description: Type of activity including the type of transaction

comments.description: Additional information entered as part of the activity or on this screen as a 'Staff info only' activity

notify.description: A flag to determine if a patron should be notified or not

balance.description: Calculated amount of remaining balance based on original fee/fine and what has been paid/waived/transferred/refunded

transactionInformation.description: Number or other transaction id related to payment

createdAt.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID), this is a 128-bit number used to identify a record and is shown in hex with dashes, for example 6312d172-f0cf-40f6-b27d-9fa8feaf332f; the UUID version must be from 1-5; see https://dev.folio.org/guides/uuids/

originalCreatedAt.description: Original invalid (non-UUID) value of 'createdAt' moved here when UUID-validation was enabled for 'createdAt'

source.description: Person who processed activity (from login information)

accountId.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID), this is a 128-bit number used to identify a record and is shown in hex with dashes, for example 6312d172-f0cf-40f6-b27d-9fa8feaf332f; the UUID version must be from 1-5; see https://dev.folio.org/guides/uuids/

id.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID), this is a 128-bit number used to identify a record and is shown in hex with dashes, for example 6312d172-f0cf-40f6-b27d-9fa8feaf332f; the UUID version must be from 1-5; see https://dev.folio.org/guides/uuids/
